0:
cd /opt/cloudbeaver \
&& cp -R conf drivers run-server.sh samples server web /cb/ \
&& chown 1000:1000 -R /cb/* \
&& ls -lah /cb/

until pg_isready -h vaultwarden-postgresql-rw -U vaultwarden; do
  echo "Waiting for PostgreSQL to be ready..."
  sleep 2
done

; <?php exit; ?> DO NOT REMOVE THIS LINE
[system]
timezone = "Europe/Berlin"
[error]
output = "http"

- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__LOAD_EXAMPLES
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__HIDE_SENSITIVE_VAR_CONN_FIELDS
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
  value: Australia/Perth
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__BASE_URL
  value: 'https://airflow.${SECRET_DOMAIN}'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__DEFAULT_WRAP
  value: 'True'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__EXPOSE_CONFIG
  value: 'True'

- secretRef:
    name: airflow-secrets
- configMapRef:
    name: airflow-user-config
